main event: On 10 September 1956, a silver gray cigar-shaped object was sighted in Waldoboro, Maine.
interesting points: The object approached the observer at high speed., It hovered and made two 90-degree turns before returning to its original course., The object was described as the size of a quarter at arm's length., It emitted a diffused light but lacked distinct contours., The sighting lasted for about 5 minutes.
witness description: a 29-year-old clerk typist and petty officer in the United States Navy
